discovery_rule.name: Informix dbspaces
discovery_rule.description:
Lista todos os dbspaces para instancia encontrada no servidor. O script zabifx utiliza o comando "onstat -g dis" + "onstat -d" para identificar os dbspaces. Ela gera duas macros : {#IFXSERVER} , {#IFXDBSPACE}
{ "data":[ { "{#IFXSERVER}":"ifxdesenv2", "{#IFXDBSPACE}":"rootdbs" }, { "{#IFXSERVER}":"ifxdesenv2", "{#IFXDBSPACE}":"llogdbs" }, { "{#IFXSERVER}":"ifxdesenv2", "{#IFXDBSPACE}":"plogdbs" }, { "{#IFXSERVER}":"ifxdesenv1", "{#IFXDBSPACE}":"rootdbs" }, { "{#IFXSERVER}":"ifxdesenv1", "{#IFXDBSPACE}":"softeldat1dbs" } ] }

item_prototype.name: {#IFXSERVER} / {#IFXDBSPACE} - Flags
item_prototype.description: Get dbspace char Flags where : Position 1: M Mirrored N Not mirrored Position 2: X Newly mirrored P Physically recovered, waiting for logical recovery L Being logically recovered R Being recovered D Down Position 3: B Blobspace P Plogspace S Sbspace T Temporary dbspace U Temporary sbspace W Temporary dbspace on primary server (This flag is shown on SD secondary servers only.) Position 4: B The dbspace can have large chunks that are greater than 2 GB. Position 5: A The dbspace is auto-expandable because the SP_AUTOEXPAND configuration parameter is enabled and the dbspace is configured with a create size or extend size that is not zero. Position 6: E The storage space is encrypted.

trigger_prototype.name: Informix DB - {#IFXSERVER} / {#IFXDBSPACE} - DBSpace DOWN
trigger_prototype.description: Flag do DBSPACE está indicando como DOWN , algum problema de disco ou no banco de dados indisponibilizou este dbspace.

trigger_prototype.name: Informix DB - {#IFXSERVER} / {#IFXDBSPACE} - DBSpace in Logical recovery
trigger_prototype.description: Dbspace em modo Logical Recovery

trigger_prototype.name: Informix DB - {#IFXSERVER} / {#IFXDBSPACE} - DBSpace in Physical recovery
trigger_prototype.description: Dbspace em modo Physical Recovery

trigger_prototype.name: Informix DB - {#IFXSERVER} / {#IFXDBSPACE} - DBSpace in Recovery mode
trigger_prototype.description: Dbspace em modo recovery

trigger_prototype.name: Informix DB - {#IFXSERVER} / {#IFXDBSPACE} - FULL
Informix DB - {#IFXSERVER} / {#IFXDBSPACE} - Huge space allocation (+10%) - {ITEM.VALUE} MBytes
Informix DB - {#IFXSERVER} / {#IFXDBSPACE} - Less than {$MAX_FREE_ALERT_MB} MB or 5% free - {ITEM.VALUE} MBytes
Informix DB - {#IFXSERVER} / {#IFXDBSPACE} - Less than {$MAX_FREE_ALERT_MB}MB or 10% free - {ITEM.VALUE} MBytes

dependency.name: Informix DB - {#IFXSERVER} / {#IFXDBSPACE} - Less than {$MAX_FREE_ALERT_MB} MB or 5% free - {ITEM.VALUE} MBytes

discovery_rule.name: Informix Instances
discovery_rule.description:
Lista cada instancia encontrada no servidor. O script zabifx utiliza o comando "onstat -g dis" para identificar as instancias e retorna duas macros : {#IFXSERVER} , {#IFXSERVERSTATUS} :
{ "instances":[ { "#{IFXSERVER}":"ifxdesenv2", "#{IFXSERVERSTATUS}":"Up" }, { "#{IFXSERVER}":"ifxdesenv1", "#{IFXSERVERSTATUS}":"Up" } ] }

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Assert Faileds raised
item_prototype.description: How many times occur an Assert Failed

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Assert Failed !!
trigger_prototype.description: Foi identificado no online.log a geração de algum Assert Failed. -- Conferir os ultimos arquivos gerados na pastas $INFORMIXDIR/tmp/dump/*.af Identificar nele a sessão , usuário e SQL que estava executando. Avaliar a situação, se necessário abrir chamado na IBM e enviar os AFs + online.log . --

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - # Sessions Active
item_prototype.description: # of Active Sessions. Executed by Zabbix Agent + UserParameter + zabifx script

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Buffer flushes
item_prototype.description: The number of times the buffers are flushed to disk so far.

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Buffer Waits
item_prototype.description: The number of buffer waits.

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Checkpoints
item_prototype.description: The number of checkpoints taken so far.

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Checkpoint in Progress
item_prototype.description: The value of yes if a checkpoint is underway.

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Time since last checkpoint
item_prototype.description: Time (in secs) since the last checkpoint occured.

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Checkpoints Waits
item_prototype.description: The number of checkpoint waits.

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - # Deadlocks
item_prototype.description: The number of deadlocks detected so far.

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Deadlocks : {ITEM.VALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Trigger alarm if occur to any Dead Lock

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - # Foreground Writes
item_prototype.description: The number of foreground writes.

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - # Latchs Waits
item_prototype.description: The total number of times any thread waited for a latch.

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Logical Log Automatic Backup (zabifx)
item_prototype.description:
Logical Log Auto backup status , based at alarmprogram script
return : true or false

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Logical Log auto backup NOT active.
trigger_prototype.description: Trigger the alarm if the automatic backup is *not* active.

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - # Logical Logs used
item_prototype.description:
# of Logical Logs used (based on uniqueid flow, onstat -l)
Executed by Zabbix Agent + UserParameter + zabifx script

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - # Logical Logs without backup
item_prototype.description:
# of Logical Logs without backup
Executed by Zabbix Agent + UserParameter + zabifx script

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - % Logical Logs without backup
item_prototype.description:
% of Logical Logs without backup (calculed from the # of active logs, onstat -l output)
Executed by Zabbix Agent + UserParameter + zabifx script

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[llogwithoutbkpperc,{#IFXSERVER}])>5 and ( ( {TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 and (time()<080000 or time()>173000) ) or {TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 )
trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Basic alarm Logical Log without backup
trigger_prototype.description:
Trigger the alarm if the number of logical logs without backup reach 5% of available logs.
Alarm only at non-comercial time.... This if only to trying get the problem of the out of logical log before night...

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - {ITEM.VALUE}% Logical Log without backup
trigger_prototype.description: Trigger the alarm if the number of logical logs without backup reach 30% of available logs.

dependency.name: trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - {ITEM.VALUE}% Logical Log without backup
trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - {ITEM.VALUE}% Logical Log without backup
trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - {ITEM.VALUE}% Logical Log without backup

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - {ITEM.VALUE}% Logical Log without backup
trigger_prototype.description: Trigger the alarm if the number of logical logs without backup reach 50% of available logs.

dependency.name: trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - {ITEM.VALUE}% Logical Log without backup
trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - {ITEM.VALUE}% Logical Log without backup

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - {ITEM.VALUE}% Logical Log without backup
trigger_prototype.description: Trigger the alarm if the number of logical logs without backup reach 70% of available logs.

dependency.name: trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - {ITEM.VALUE}% Logical Log without backup

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - {ITEM.VALUE}% Logical Log without backup
trigger_prototype.description: Trigger the alarm if the number of logical logs without backup reach 90% of available logs.

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - # LRU writes
item_prototype.description: The number of LRU writes.

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Memory Free Buffer
item_prototype.description: Total of memory Buffer Pool used (summary of onstat -g seg)

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Memory Used Buffer
item_prototype.description: Total of memory Buffer Pool used (summary of onstat -g seg)

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Memory Free Extent
item_prototype.description: Total of memory Extent free (datablades) (summary of onstat -g seg)

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Memory Used Extent
item_prototype.description: Total of memory Extent used (datablades) (summary of onstat -g seg)

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Memory Free Residence
item_prototype.description: Total of memory Resident Pool free (summary of onstat -g seg)

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Memory Used Residence
item_prototype.description: Total of memory Resident Pool used (summary of onstat -g seg)

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Memory Allocated
item_prototype.description: Total of memory allocated in the O.S. (summary of onstat -g seg)

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Memory Free Total
item_prototype.description: Total of memory Total free (summary of onstat -g seg)

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Memory Used Total
item_prototype.description: Total of memory Total used (summary of onstat -g seg)

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Memory Free Virtual
item_prototype.description: Total of memory Virtual Pool free (summary of onstat -g seg)

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Memory Used Virtual
item_prototype.description: Total of memory Virtual Pool used (summary of onstat -g seg)

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Online.log MSGPATH
item_prototype.description: The filename of the online.log

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - # Network accepteds
item_prototype.description: The number of network connection accepted so far.

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - # Network reads
item_prototype.description: The number of network reads so far.

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - # Network rejected
item_prototype.description: The number of network connection rejected so far.

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - # Network writes
item_prototype.description: The number of network writes so far.

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Physical Log Size
item_prototype.description: Size of Physical log in bytes

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Physical Log pages used
item_prototype.description: The number of bytes used in the physical logfile.

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - # RSS Backlog
item_prototype.description:
# of RSS backlog ( ~ delay ) in pages (logical log)
Executed by Zabbix Agent + UserParameter + zabifx script

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - # RSS Connections active
item_prototype.description:
# of RSS connections active
Executed by Zabbix Agent + UserParameter + zabifx script

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - # RSS Servers
item_prototype.description:
# of RSS servers configured
Executed by Zabbix Agent + UserParameter + zabifx script

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Status (zabifx)
item_prototype.description:
Informix database status , based at onstat return :
onstat - ; $? # 0 Initialization mode # 1 Quiescent mode # 2 Recovery mode # 3 Backup mode # 4 Shutdown mode # 5 Online mode # 6 Abort mode # 7 User mode # 255 Off-Line mode

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Abort mode (zabifx)
trigger_prototype.description:
Status differ 5 (online) , database isn't available to users.
# 0 Initialization mode # 1 Quiescent mode # 2 Recovery mode # 3 Backup mode # 4 Shutdown mode # 5 Online mode # 6 Abort mode # 7 User mode # 255 Off-Line mode

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Backup mode (zabifx)
trigger_prototype.description:
Status differ 5 (online) , database isn't available to users.
# 0 Initialization mode # 1 Quiescent mode # 2 Recovery mode # 3 Backup mode # 4 Shutdown mode # 5 Online mode # 6 Abort mode # 7 User mode # 255 Off-Line mode

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Down! (zabifx)
trigger_prototype.description:
Status differ 5 (online) , database isn't available to users.
# 0 Initialization mode # 1 Quiescent mode # 2 Recovery mode # 3 Backup mode # 4 Shutdown mode # 5 Online mode # 6 Abort mode # 7 User mode # 255 Off-Line mode

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Initialization mode (zabifx)
trigger_prototype.description:
Status differ 5 (online) , database isn't available to users.
# 0 Initialization mode # 1 Quiescent mode # 2 Recovery mode # 3 Backup mode # 4 Shutdown mode # 5 Online mode # 6 Abort mode # 7 User mode # 255 Off-Line mode

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Quiescent mode (zabifx)
trigger_prototype.description:
Status differ 5 (online) , database isn't available to users.
# 0 Initialization mode # 1 Quiescent mode # 2 Recovery mode # 3 Backup mode # 4 Shutdown mode # 5 Online mode # 6 Abort mode # 7 User mode # 255 Off-Line mode

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Recovery mode (zabifx)
trigger_prototype.description:
Status differ 5 (online) , database isn't available to users.
# 0 Initialization mode # 1 Quiescent mode # 2 Recovery mode # 3 Backup mode # 4 Shutdown mode # 5 Online mode # 6 Abort mode # 7 User mode # 255 Off-Line mode

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Shutdown mode (zabifx)
trigger_prototype.description:
Status differ 5 (online) , database isn't available to users.
# 0 Initialization mode # 1 Quiescent mode # 2 Recovery mode # 3 Backup mode # 4 Shutdown mode # 5 Online mode # 6 Abort mode # 7 User mode # 255 Off-Line mode

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Unavailable (zabifx)
trigger_prototype.description:
Status differ 5 (online) , database isn't available to users.
# 0 Initialization mode # 1 Quiescent mode # 2 Recovery mode # 3 Backup mode # 4 Shutdown mode # 5 Online mode # 6 Abort mode # 7 User mode # 255 Off-Line mode

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - User mode (zabifx)
trigger_prototype.description:
Status differ 5 (online) , database isn't available to users.
# 0 Initialization mode # 1 Quiescent mode # 2 Recovery mode # 3 Backup mode # 4 Shutdown mode # 5 Online mode # 6 Abort mode # 7 User mode # 255 Off-Line mode

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - # Sessions
item_prototype.description: # of User Sessions. Executed by Zabbix Agent + UserParameter + zabifx script

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Shared Memory allowed - SHMTOTAL configuration
item_prototype.description: The maximum amount of shared memory allowed for the server.

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - # System Threads
item_prototype.description: # of system Threads (onstat -g ath minus sqlexec) Executed by Zabbix Agent + UserParameter + zabifx script

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - # Threads Ready
item_prototype.description: # of Threads Ready (onstat -g rea) to run into CPU Executed by Zabbix Agent + UserParameter + zabifx script

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - # Sessions top
item_prototype.description:
Max # of Active Sessions since the database was started.
Executed by Zabbix Agent + UserParameter + zabifx script

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - # Threads
item_prototype.description: # of Threads (onstat -g ath) Executed by Zabbix Agent + UserParameter + zabifx script

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Uptime
item_prototype.description:
Time the instance is UP. Based on "onstat -" header output
Executed by Zabbix Agent + UserParameter + zabifx script

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - # Sessions in lock waits
item_prototype.description:
# of User Sessions waiting for lock.
Executed by Zabbix Agent + UserParameter + zabifx script

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Sessions in lock
trigger_prototype.description: Trigger alarm if occur to any session be was locked on the last three capture consecutive... ---- onstat -u | grep "\<L"

dependency.name: trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Sessions in lock
dependency.expression: last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[userlockwaiting,{#IFXSERVER}],#5)>0 and last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[userlockwaiting,{#IFXSERVER}],#4)>0 and last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[userlockwaiting,{#IFXSERVER}],#3)>0 and last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[userlockwaiting,{#IFXSERVER}],#3)>0 and last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[userlockwaiting,{#IFXSERVER}],#2)>0 and last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[userlockwaiting,{#IFXSERVER}],#1)>0

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[userlockwaiting,{#IFXSERVER}],#5)>0 and last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[userlockwaiting,{#IFXSERVER}],#4)>0 and last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[userlockwaiting,{#IFXSERVER}],#3)>0 and last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[userlockwaiting,{#IFXSERVER}],#3)>0 and last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[userlockwaiting,{#IFXSERVER}],#2)>0 and last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[userlockwaiting,{#IFXSERVER}],#1)>0
trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Sessions in lock
trigger_prototype.description: Trigger alarm if occur to any session be was locked on the last five capture consecutive... ---- onstat -u | grep "\<L"

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - # Sessions in waits
item_prototype.description:
# of User Sessions waiting for something what isn't lock or yield process.
Executed by Zabbix Agent + UserParameter + zabifx script

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[userwaiting,{#IFXSERVER}],#5)>0 and last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[userwaiting,{#IFXSERVER}],#4)>0 and last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[userwaiting,{#IFXSERVER}],#3)>0 and last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[userwaiting,{#IFXSERVER}],#3)>0 and last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[userwaiting,{#IFXSERVER}],#2)>0 and last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[userwaiting,{#IFXSERVER}],#1)>0
trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Sessions in wait
trigger_prototype.description: Trigger alarm if occur to any session be in wait (not locking) on the last five capture consecutive... (= 10 minutes)

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - Informix Version
item_prototype.description: Informix version

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix version change
trigger_prototype.description: $ onstat -

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - # VPs
item_prototype.description: The current number of virtual processors.

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - VP ADM- Administrative
item_prototype.description: CPU Total consumption of VP (summary of onstat -g glo)

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - VP AIO
item_prototype.description: CPU Total consumption of VP (summary of onstat -g glo)

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - VP BTS - Basic text search
item_prototype.description: CPU Total consumption of VP (summary of onstat -g glo)

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - VP CPU
item_prototype.description: CPU Total consumption of VP (summary of onstat -g glo)

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - VP ENC - Encrypt
item_prototype.description: CPU Total consumption of VP (summary of onstat -g glo)

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - VP Encrypt - SSL
item_prototype.description: CPU Total consumption of VP (summary of onstat -g glo)

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - VP FIFO
item_prototype.description: CPU Total consumption of VP (summary of onstat -g glo)

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - VP XML
item_prototype.description: CPU Total consumption of VP (summary of onstat -g glo)

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - VP LIO - Logical Log
item_prototype.description: CPU Total consumption of VP (summary of onstat -g glo)

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - VP MSC - Miscellaneus
item_prototype.description: CPU Total consumption of VP (summary of onstat -g glo)

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - VP PIO - Physical Log
item_prototype.description: CPU Total consumption of VP (summary of onstat -g glo)

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - VP SOC- Socket
item_prototype.description: CPU Total consumption of VP (summary of onstat -g glo)

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - VP SSL
item_prototype.description: CPU Total consumption of VP (summary of onstat -g glo)

trigger_prototype.expression: ( (last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[totalthreads,{#IFXSERVER}]) - last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[systemthreads,{#IFXSERVER}])) / last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[sessioncount,{#IFXSERVER}])) > 3 and ( (last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[totalthreads,{#IFXSERVER}],#2) - last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[systemthreads,{#IFXSERVER}],#2)) / last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[sessioncount,{#IFXSERVER}],#2)) > 3 and ( (last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[totalthreads,{#IFXSERVER}],#3) - last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[systemthreads,{#IFXSERVER}],#3)) / last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[sessioncount,{#IFXSERVER}],#3)) > 3
trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - # threads high
trigger_prototype.description: Alarm if the number of users threads is three times of # of sessions . (there is no sense this occur at mostly of environments)

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - 10% of the memory allowed free
trigger_prototype.description: Alarm if the amount of memory allocated into the OS become less of 10% close of the SHMTOTAL set.

dependency.name: trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - memory allocated is close of 100% of memory allowed

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - memory allocated is close of 100% of memory allowed
trigger_prototype.description: Alarm if the amount of memory allocated into the OS become close of 100% of the SHMTOTAL set.

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - RSS connection
trigger_prototype.description: trigger the alarm if exists any RSS server configured and the last two checks there is no connection;

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[rssservers,{#IFXSERVER}])>0 and last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[rssbacklog,{#IFXSERVER}],#1) > last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[rssbacklog,{#IFXSERVER}],#2) and last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[rssbacklog,{#IFXSERVER}],#2) > last(/templ - Informix/zabifx[rssbacklog,{#IFXSERVER}],#3)
trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#IFXSERVER} - RSS sync
trigger_prototype.description: trigger the alarm if exists any RSS server configured and the last three backlog capture is growing (~ secondary isn't applying the log for some reason)

discovery_rule.name: Informix sbspaces
discovery_rule.description:
Lista todos os sbspaces para instancia encontrada no servidor. O script zabifx utiliza o comando "onstat -g dis" + "onstat -d" para identificar os sbspaces. Ela gera duas macros : {#IFXSERVER} , {#IFXDBSPACE}
{ "data":[ { "{#IFXSERVER}":"ifxdesenv2", "{#IFXDBSPACE}":"rootdbs" }, { "{#IFXSERVER}":"ifxdesenv2", "{#IFXDBSPACE}":"llogdbs" }, { "{#IFXSERVER}":"ifxdesenv2", "{#IFXDBSPACE}":"plogdbs" }, { "{#IFXSERVER}":"ifxdesenv1", "{#IFXDBSPACE}":"rootdbs" }, { "{#IFXSERVER}":"ifxdesenv1", "{#IFXDBSPACE}":"softeldat1dbs" } ] }

item_prototype.name: {#IFXSERVER} / {#IFXDBSPACE} - Flags
item_prototype.description: Get dbspace char Flags where : Position 1: M Mirrored N Not mirrored Position 2: X Newly mirrored P Physically recovered, waiting for logical recovery L Being logically recovered R Being recovered D Down Position 3: B Blobspace P Plogspace S Sbspace T Temporary dbspace U Temporary sbspace W Temporary dbspace on primary server (This flag is shown on SD secondary servers only.) Position 4: B The dbspace can have large chunks that are greater than 2 GB. Position 5: A The dbspace is auto-expandable because the SP_AUTOEXPAND configuration parameter is enabled and the dbspace is configured with a create size or extend size that is not zero. Position 6: E The storage space is encrypted.

trigger_prototype.name: Informix DB - {#IFXSERVER} / {#IFXDBSPACE} - Less than {$MAX_FREE_ALERT_MB} MB or 5% free - {ITEM.VALUE} MBytes
Informix DB - {#IFXSERVER} / {#IFXDBSPACE} - FULL
